articles.author: Deutsche Welle (www.dw.com)
articles.title: Space exploration could be Earth’s saving grace - Deutsche Welle
articles.description: A bird’s eye view of the Earth could help identify the issues causing the climate crisis, space experts said at the 14th European Space Conference last week.
articles.content:
The first time German astronaut Alexander Gerst took off into space, he was overwhelmed. Hed seen satellite photos of Earth before, but they were nothing in comparison with the real thing.
I [saw] t… [+8032 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Denmark scraps most pandemic restrictions, no longer considers COVID 'a socially critical disease' - ABC News
articles.description: Denmark becomes the first European Union member nation to ditch significant pandemic restrictions, doing away with face masks and digital passes as Omicron drives a surge in daily case numbers.
articles.content: Denmark has become one of the first European Union member nations to scrap most pandemic restrictions as the Scandinavian country no longer considers the COVID-19 outbreak "a socially critical diseas… [+3799 chars]
